tool_description: Unlock a Universe of Movies: Explore and filter through 1M+ Films/Movies
name: MovieDatabase
title: MovieDatabase

api_list.name: Search by title
api_list.description: Search endpoint, returns the top 20 most relevant results based on the title input, ideal for a built in search bar.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com/Search/Incep"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com/Search/{title}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Filter
api_list.description: Allows users to Filter by Rating, Year of Release, Revenue, Genres, Runtime, Adult content, Original Language and Spoken Language

required_parameters.name: Limit
required_parameters.description: How many results do you want to return

optional_parameters.name: MaxRuntime
optional_parameters.description: Max runtime of the movies you want to find (in minutes) example: 180 (3hours)

optional_parameters.name: MinYear
optional_parameters.description: Minimum Year of movie you want to be returned example: 2022

optional_parameters.name: MaxRevenue
optional_parameters.description: The maximum revenue of the movies you want to find example: 100000000 (100million)

optional_parameters.name: OriginalLanguage
optional_parameters.description: The original language of the movie (country code) example: en (english)

optional_parameters.name: Genre
optional_parameters.description: The Genre category you want to look for example: Action

optional_parameters.name: MaxYear
optional_parameters.description: Max Year of Movie you want to be returned example: 2023

optional_parameters.name: SpokenLanguage
optional_parameters.description: search for movies spoken in this language (language name) example: English

optional_parameters.name: MinRating
optional_parameters.description: The lower bound of rating you want to find

optional_parameters.name: MinRevenue
optional_parameters.description: The Minimum revenue of the movies you want to return example: 1000000 (1million)

optional_parameters.name: MaxRating
optional_parameters.description: The upper bound of rating you want to find

optional_parameters.name: MinRuntime
optional_parameters.description: The minimum runtime of the movies (in minutes) e.g 120 (2hours)

api_list.name: Find By Title
api_list.description: Allows users to find movies by searching their title
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com/FindByTitle/Inception"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com/FindByTitle/{title}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Find By IMDB ID
api_list.description: Allows the user to search for movies via their IMDB ID

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Random
api_list.description: Allows the user to randomly return an assortment of movies, adjust the amount using the limit property
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com/Random/20"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com/Random/{limit}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moviedatabase8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
